stories.text:
Hello everyone, I have been working for a while on Serendipity Theme and I have been porting it to other platforms too with help of my friend Fabi and other contributors.

Now on V2 some big changes have taken place, like the whole color palette, contrast, new icons and such.

------------------ Three versions: --

- Morning - Sunset - Night

-----------------

This is the Marketplace: --- V2 - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=wicked-labs.wvsc-serendipity

V1 is also available for those that liked it more. - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=wicked-labs.old-serendipity ---

The official site. - https://serendipitytheme.com/ ---

Github - https://github.com/serendipity-theme ---

There's almost 15K users by no pull request whatsoever.

Feel free to make tour version along the guidelines on the repo and enjoy the theme itself.

Hope you all like it and have a good day!

/mike
stories.title: Show HN: Serendipity Theme for vs and Other Apps
Ask HN: Moving for a tech job? From what city and where are you going?

stories.text:
I'm currently on that stage of my career where I'm thinking of investing time in automating some of the tasks that I perform frequently during my day job or otherwise. That could be from setting up a fresh laptop to my preference to fetching/opening source in Bitbucket/Github from command line, to recurring shell commands that I execute for work.

Interested to know what tools/software you've built for your own productivity and your tools of choice?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are some things that you have built for your own personal tooling?
